character.statement: I do all the work and *you* get the medallion??

First you get me voted off from that show, NOW you take all the credit AFTER I WASTE MY BLOOD, SWEAT, AND TEARS DEFEATING EVERY SINGLE ONE OF THEM. *you push him to the wall* You really are a fool, you know that?

First you two get me voted off from that show, NOW you take all the credit AFTER I WASTE MY BLOOD, SWEAT, AND TEARS DEFEATING EVERY SINGLE ONE OF THEM. *you push him to the wall* You're just like your criminal sister, you know that?
Yeah, yeah, whatever. I still hate you.
Please don't hurt me! I'll give you the medallion, you just need to do me a favor, I promise!
Woah, woah, woah, woah, that was just a game! I'll give you the medallion over a hot dog, just calm down!
